name: 小糸
text:
よ、夜ごはんの前だから……！
ちょっとだよ……！
trans:
I──it's almost dinner, so...!
Only a little...!

name: 雛菜
text:
え～～～
雛菜、おやつがごはんでいいのに～……
trans:
Eeehh～?
Hinana's fine with her snacks as dinner～...

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
わかったよ、小糸ちゃん

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～～～
じゃあ雛菜もわかった～♡
trans:
Hmmm～
Alright, then Hinana's got it too～♡

name: 小糸
text:
……！？
と、透ちゃん、それけっこう大き────

name: 雛菜
trans: Awright, Hinana's goin' for it too～♡

name: 小糸
text:
ああ……！
そ、それは脂肪分がすご────
trans:
Aaah...!
Th──that has a really high fat con──

name: 小糸
text:
も、もう……！
透ちゃんも雛菜ちゃんも……！
trans:
J──jeez...!
Toru-chan, Hinana-chan, both of you...!

name: 小糸
text:
あ、アイドルやるんだから
食べすぎはだめってプロデューサーさんが────
trans: W... we're all idols now, so you shouldn't overeat like that! Even the Producer──

name: 透
text:
ふふっ、小糸ちゃん
これ買ったげる
trans:
Fufu. Koito-chan.
I'll buy this for you.

name: 透
text:
うん
指にはめられるって、ほら
trans:
Yeah.
Says it fits on your finger. Like this.

name: 小糸
trans:
Th... that's pretty...!
It's a ring...!

name: 雛菜
trans:
Eeehh～
That's nice～, what about Hinana～?

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
じゃあ雛菜も

name: 雛菜
text:
やは～～～♡
透先輩だいすき～～～♡

name: 小糸
text:
──こっ、これは飴だしちょっとだし
ごはんの前に食べても、だ、大丈夫……！
trans:
──It──it's just candy, and it's only a little,
so having it before dinner is... is... okay...!

name: 小糸
text:
う、うん……！
透ちゃん、ありがとう……！

name: 透
text: もっとじゃんじゃん入れて
trans: Keep throwing the good stuff in.

name: 小糸
text:
ええ……！　ちょ、ちょっとだけって────
飴だけでいいよ、透ちゃん……！
trans:
Eehh...! I said──I said just a little──
I'm fine with just candy, Toru-chan...!

name: 雛菜
text:
えっと～～～
じゃあ雛菜、ネイルポリッシュもいい～？
trans:
Lessee～
Then can Hinana have some nail polish too～?

name: 小糸
text:
ひ、雛菜ちゃん……！
それもうお菓子じゃなくなってるよ……！
trans:
H──Hinana-chan...!
This isn't even sweets anymore...!

name: 透
text:
あはは、いいね
入れて入れて
trans:
Ahaha. That's fine.
Put it in, put it in.

name: コンビニ店員
trans: Six items, 33 yen each. Two items, 253 yen each──

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～～～♡
透先輩が買ってくれたお菓子～♡
trans:
Hnnn～♡
Toru-senpai's sweets bought just for me～♡

name: 雛菜
text:
これ食べられないし
捨てられないね～～～？
trans:
I can't just eat these～
Couldn't throw them away, right～♡?

name: 小糸
text:
と、透ちゃん……！
ありがとう……！

name: 小糸
trans: I──I'll be sure to... eat them with care...!

name: 透
text: 今月携帯代、めっちゃ安かったから
trans: My phone bill this month was real light, after all.

name: コンビニ店員
text: ──お支払いは現金でよろしいですか？
trans: ──Would you like to pay by cash?
